review: ive been using the roc retinol correxion line smoothing antiaging cream for a few months now and i have some mixed feelings about its effectiveness. i didnt really notice a difference at all. i would rather pay for something a little more expensive and know that it will work. i must note that the results have been more moderate than i had hoped for. while there has been some improvement it hasnt been as dramatic as i anticipated based on the product claims. its possible that my expectations were too high but i was hoping for a more noticeable difference in the appearance of fine lines.one drawback ive experienced is mild irritation. i followed the recommended usage instructions gradually introducing the product into my skincare routine but i still experienced some redness flakiness and sensitivity. its not unbearable but it does make me hesitant to use the cream as frequently as i would like.the packaging is simple and functional and i appreciate the hygienic pump dispenser. the cream itself has a lightweight texture and is easily absorbed which is a plus for daytime use under makeup.in terms of scent there is a faint chemical odor that dissipates quickly after application. its not overwhelming but its worth mentioning for those who are sensitive to scents.in conclusion the roc retinol correxion line smoothing antiaging cream has provided some improvement in my skins texture and fine lines albeit at a more moderate level. the mild irritation and the lessdramatic results are the main reasons for my 3star rating. while it may work better for others ill likely continue exploring other options for my antiaging skincare routine. moderate results mild irritation

review: i have been using this product 56 days a week fora little over a month now and i have noticed a softening in the lines around my eyes especially when i wear foundation andor powder i have a lot less creasing than i did before.  this product doesnt completely eliminate lines but they have improved more than with any other product i have tried so far.i use this product mainly at night instead of during the day because if i wear it under makeup my experience has been that my eyeshadow wears off a lot faster than if i just use an eyelid primer.  i have tried it under the makeup primer and had creasing and makeup fade.  this might be because i have pretty oily skin even on my eyelids.  those of you with dryer or more normal skin might have no problems at all with wearing this under makeup so definitely try it for yourself.still even though i cant use it as intended i do see results that for the price of the product i think are pretty impressive.  plus even after a month i still have about 23 of the tube left you dont need a lot of product at all.  in fact i recommend starting with the smallest dab you can put on your fingertip patting it in and then adding more if you need to.  i made the mistake early on of putting too much product on so that my skin wasnt able to absorb it all and about an hour later when i rubbed my eye i got a most unpleasant burning sensation. granted it doesnt last all that long but why waste product and get a burning eyeif youre looking for a good eye cream for a relatively low price this one is definitely worth trying. not a miracle product but i have noticed results

review: i am 33 had a baby right before i turned 31 prior to that i had cystic type acne all my life that i never grew out of then got acne in places i never had it before when i was pregnant and lets face it growing a baby does stuff to your body some stuff you never come back from and i stayed pretty hormonally imbalanced for a long time. im very fair skinned and every pimple popped or unpopped left a lasting pink scar on my face requiring concealer months long after its official departure. a reminder of the pimple that had beenhad almost been that needed to be hidden as more approached. id used the classic proactiv with the best results for years and years and went right back to that with the same results of its not 100 but its better than everything else. and on top of it i have always had an incredibly oily face and scalp. my mother first suggested something with hyaluronic acid and that was becoming increasingly popular while i was pregnant and was not supposed to use it so i didnt give it another thought. but with my boy about to be turning 2 and my skin still so confused i figured id give it a shot. i read outstanding reviews of this stuff and figured id give it a shot. i got the serum and the hyaluronic acid moisturizer and got the regular face cream and eye cream in case my skin got dry. i just read a bunch of people talking about how the first week or two you use it it can cause dryness and some peeling so i figured i should have some of the basic stuff too. i dont know if its just that my skin was used to the harshness of benzoyl peroxide on the regular or that im so greasy but i didnt experience any of the dryness redness or irritation that a lot of people report the first couple weeks. and i really went balls to the wall with this and cut the proactiv out completely. scary prospect for me. but no joke just using the serum and the hyaluronic acid moisturizer every day within a few days my skin calmed down a massive amount. the moisturizer is a little on the heavy side although i used it pretty liberally and is a little heavy for use under makeup if youre heavy handed like me but id still put some on let it soak in awhile and just wipe my face down real quick with a cleansing cloth and it was all good. by the end of the first week id had no new pimples and noticed dramatic lightening in the marks from old pimples along with a generally more even skin tone and my face felt smoother softer calmer and looked it too. i have not turned back. the best part is that my skin is also not as greasy as it was before and i have finally found a moisturizer that doesnt make me break out worse. and my skin just soaks up that serum and that stuff is amazing. all these products are amazing

review: if a picture is worth a 1000 words then 5 photos will be worth a book.  the cream was delivered this afternoon.  i immediately tried it.  i never expected this result.i knew the cream was out for delivery so i didnt put makeup on today.  all you see is my clean face which i washed 4 hours ago.  ive not applied anything no creams no serums nothing.  im 63 about to turn 64 in 3 weeks.  i dont use retinol and although i probably should be using a lightweight cream at night i dont.  my face is still pretty oily and i have oily eyelids.all photos are taken in natural light in the living room with just light coming in the windows.  i didnt use the camera flash.  with the exception of the final photo i even sat in the same chair.  i tried to crop the photos the same and even tried to look in the same direction.  i tried to make the photo comparison as close exact as i could.the last photo was taken upstairs in the dressing room no artificial light with the window facing the same exposure as the living room windows.  the room is brighter because there is no porch.ive never even heard of 8 saints.  ive been looking for a peptide cream for my undereyes to wear under makeup.  ive tried several some expensive others drug store brands but ive found nothing that was extraordinary until i tried thus cream today.  its blown me away.i ordered the cream because of photos i saw in these reviews.  i never ever expected to see results like this immediately.  i saw a couple of reviews were the folks showed differences after 10 minutes or so.  most reviews were more like a week which is impressivethe photos eventually span an hour.  the first set with the cream under 1 eye were taken 6 minutes apart.  after i saw the results i put it under my other eye then finally on my eyelids.  finally i put it on the 11 worry lines between my eyebrows which are very deep.  i couldnt believe the difference in just a few minutes.i wanted to make sure that the results werent just from sudden hydration.  most of the time you can hydrate and fine lines will disappear only to return after a half hour or so after the cream has completely absorbed.  thats why i took the final photo where the room was a bit brighter to show everything but not so bright as to wash out any features.the photo speaks for itself.  ive started a small photographic file.  im going to continue to take a photograph daily in the same room at the same time per day so we all can see how 8 saints performs over a longer period.im extremely thrilled with this product.  i hope they never change the formula because theyve hit on a proven winnerbtw the amount i used was about 1 grain of longgrained rice total on all areas.it1. a long way2. soaks in immediately3. is lightweight4. creamy5. nonsticky6. not shiney7. not oily8. no smell at all9. no stinging or burning it performs as advertised plus some  see photos

review: update 10924ive been using it for around 5 weeks and i see a positive difference. puffiness especially right after waking up goes down considerably after putting it on. i get terrible dark circles under my eyes and after using it consistently they are much better. i think this is one of the most effective products i have ever used for my undereyes.tips for applyingthe first time i used it i went to town with the rollerball on my undereyes. i pumped with the rollerball directly onto my skin. the pump lets out a lot of product on one squeeze.then there was left over serum on my face so i took it and rubbed a very thin layer onto my eyelids with my finger since it felt so nice.this resulted in a small bit of the product running into the top of my eye. plus the excess from the rollerball backed up into the bottom of my eyes.big mistakesmy eyes were very blurry. id tear up and try and wipe my eyes and the blurry would keep coming back for awhile which of course freaked me out.here is my new way of applying the product pump the bottle 12 or 14 pump onto a cotton swab q tip use the cotton swab to rub a small amount under your eyes but closer to the top of your cheekbones if you have crows feet be extra careful to keep the serum from getting in the outer corners of your eyes do not put on eyelids to avoid having even a little bit of it drip into your eyes as it is a thin runny serumi think it works well although i have not had it long. i like the mix of active ingredients it has. there is a lot of good stuff in here. its an excellent value. before i bought this i had just returned a similar product with an eye rollerball that was over three times the price.in conclusion i think i will keep it and keep using it. i recommend trying it. very effective. i highly recommend it

review: you absolutely see an immediate visible tightening. however what i soon after learned is that it just seems to be behaving as a cover that temporarily tightens versus something that actually improves your skin. but what really did it for me and why i am rating it low is because i was sitting at my desk about 2 hours after and i had an itch on my eye. after i moved the skin where ever i had put the serum turned immediately into a white cracked web. so just out of curiosity as i stood in front of the mirror i gently touched the skin near the outside corner of my other key and sure enough it did the same thing instantly. once it dries if you move our touch the skin in any way it literally turns white and cracked everywhere you put the serum. no thank you. luckily i was at home and could wash it off. but what if i had been in front of someone and needed to itch my eye. sorry not what i was looking for. so if you are looking for a temporary facade of tigher skin and you will never have any movement to your skin in that area go for it. it will look good. but if you are human and have any amount of movement on your face beware. i wish i would return it for a refund and get my 20 back but since i used it that one time i dont think i am eligible. just a wasted 20. i was so hopeful but am so diappointed

review: i like the packaging on this product it has a square light acrylicplastic jar which is attractive and easy to use. for an eye cream product the product amount is quite large at half an ounce. the cream itself is white with a bit of a smellbut it only seems to be very lightly fragranced and i can really only smell it right as i put it on. then it smells a bit floral but i dont notice it after the product absorbs. the product does absorb well and it leaves my skin feeling supple for hours .this cream is supposed to be and overall eye rejuvenator including the lashes. i have not found it to be any sudden miracle for my lashes but after a weeks use i do think my lashes are not falling out as much as they were. the first couple of days that i use this product i had some light itching around my eyelashes and i noticed a few came out. i had nearly decided to stop using it but it wasnt so bad that i felt the product was faulty. after a couple of days i did not experience any itch or strange feeling at all during application. it just became very pleasant to use.  i had kept using it because i thought perhaps that cell growth was just perhaps sped up. so after another week i noticed that my lashes had stopped falling out as often as they normally did. i have not noticed any extra growth but the product is certainly easy to use now all over my eye and so i will continue. it is certainly much easier and more pleasant to use this than those eyelash serums that go on with a mascara applicator.this product is definitely good for under eye crepe. well i cant say that ive had any major line reduction it does a great job of moisturizing and keeping my undereye area from looking dry and crepey. i have not noticed any improvement whatsoever in the natural darkness that i have under my eyes.well i do like the packaging i have some concern about the hygiene of putting my fingers in a jar of product that i am using at my lash line. i think that this would be better with a pump dispenser i know i certainly would feel better about it. so while i like the packaging from an aesthetic standpoint i think that from a hygienic perspective a pump would be better. pleasant to use leaves skin supple and fixes my crepe problem

review: ive been searching for something to take care of the dark circles and bagslines under my eyes for a few years. recently my dermatologist said all i needed was a product with caffeine and a moisturizer combined. i found this product and liked the reviews. when i received it i took it straight out of the box to give it a try.pros the metal eyeroller to apply the serum provides a nice cool touch that feels really nice on the skin. this also ensures that you are applying the product to the skin evenly until the skin absorbs it. the roller does not reabsorb the product like a sponge. products that require you to use your fingers for application causes you to add your own oils and absorb into the fingers with a waste of the product. i didnt see immediate results but my skin looked fuller throughout the day. i was able to apply this under my makeup. just wait for the serum to dry first. no residue or fragrances. i have sensitive skin so no irritation was a plus.cons the rollerball of the applicator has to be pushed in slightly to allow the serum to be released to use. however you dont want to press the applicator to your skin to get the release because that hurts. so i used the back of my hand. after a few tries i figured out how much pressure was enough to get the serum to flow. this was my only complaint.fyi my husband is starting to use it as well. for the price and result this is a great product.

review: i am 77 years old and have had eye bags for as long as i can remember. i have tried quite a few different products that were suppose to reduce bags under the eyes and none of them have even improved the condition. actually my problem has been twofold. there is a swelling under each eye and then a literal bag under this. the bags under the swelling are sometimes reddened and almost look like they are filled with fluid.having read the numerous positive reviews on this product i decided to try it and honestly expected no miracles. i have been using this product twice a day for about 2 weeks. although i dont see much difference in the swelling directly under my eyes the eye bags have been greatly reduced an no longer look like they are filled with fluid. granted they arent gone but i have had them for a very long time and as i said didnt expect miracles.i will continue to use this product in hopes the bags will eventually go away completely. since i dont have wrinkles to speak of the elimination of the eye bags would greatly improve my appearance. you may wonder why i bother at my age but i feel the way you look helps to improve selfesteem. it you look better you feel better. besides how many of us like to hear that we dont look our age.update 122523i have been using this product for about 5 weeks twice a day and have added before and after pictures. although i dont think the bags are completely gone they are so much smaller and less reddened than before i started using this product. i am hoping the bags will go away completely eventually but they are so much better now than they had been.update 040724at this point i have been using this product religiously for about 4 months. although there was some improvement and my eyebags go smaller the first couple of months. i havent seem much improvement in the last month or so. i guess nothing works miracles but this product did help to reduce the size of my eyebags. i plan to continue using the product for a couple more months to see if the last bit of bags just takes a little longer. after that if there is no further improvement i will likely discontinue using this product.i hope this review was helpful for you. after 2 weeks of  use seems to be working.

review: i have extremely dry skin under my eyes. it takes practice to apply this and get it right but this may not be for everyone. first thing i do is wash my face and eyes to get the morning crud out. i wait about 10 minutes for my face and under eyes to fully dry and then i apply under my eyes using the nozzle of the tube to form a line where i want it. i then swipe it under my eyes twice then use a makeup sponge to pat until smooth. i apply it all the way to the top of my cheeks because i have hollow eyes sockets from age. i know it seems like im wasting product but this is the only way this can work for me. i then wait about 1015 minutes for it to fully dry then i take a wet qtip and remove the excess until its a nice smooth oval. i also remove the excess in the corners of my eyes because it tends to cake in those areas. do not touch the wet areas that have been cleaned. let it fully dry. after that it looks great. you can apply makeup but make sure you avoid the area where the product is or it will rub off. im now using powder foundation so it makes it look more natural. if you work with this stuff you can find a way to get the results you want to make it look natural. it works. but it takes practice.

review: the first time i tried this i practiced and watched videos and i really liked it at first but as the day went on it started leaving a white residue and cracking. i tried a few other products on amazon that were more expensive like the peter roth but those didnt do anything and had the same problems. they all worked at first but they all left a white residue no matter how little i put on. so i thought i would give this one more try after reading a review where someone said not to use a fan or a blow dryer. i put a tiny bit of this on used a little brush and upward strokes and then let it set for 5 minutes without using a fan my hand or a blow dryer. what do you know. it works. the picture above is after about 5 hours. normally i would have a white residue and crackling. looks pretty good dont you think i am 52 and i normally have some bags under my eyes along with some lines. this picture was snapped without any filter on my camera. i think im going to keep this bottle after all. my advice only use a tiny little bit use a brush to stroke upwards and then just let it sit. dont fan with your hand dont fan with anything at all dont use a hair dryer nothing. just let it sit for 5 minutes. the results are worth it. honestly if i have to reapply in another hour or so its still worth it. these eye bags have been the bane of my existence. changed my mind  takes practice

review: i bought this thinking that if it didnt work id return it.  i was definitely skeptical but wanted to try it.  i have hereditarygenetic dark circles under my eyes and have had them for decades.  i put a tiny dab of the product on my finger. less than the size of the head of a map pin.  and dabbed it under only one eye so that i could compare with the other eye.  the tightening feeling started after about a minute and the appearance of the circle under my eye was greatly reduced almost immediately and looked much younger than the untreated eye.  i didnt get any white residue under my eye as some reviewers reported.  the directions do say that if you get that result youre using too much.  i couldnt possibly have dispensed less of it than what i did so im definitely not using a lot and it worked anyway.  thats great as far as im concerned.  you dont need to use much at all which will make this small container last a lot longer.  i did not put on moisturizer afterwards and i did not apply any other makeup but then i typically dont wear much makeup.  this product plumps up the area under my eye and makes the circle less noticeable.  the results last for hours. it took years off my face.  i tried it again the next day and used a bit more to see what would happen.  i got the antiaging look but also a tiny bit of white residue.  this is a case where less it more  i also tried it on laugh lines around my mouth but didnt see any noticeable results there.  no problem though i am very happy with what it does for my eyes.  i love this product.  im impressed and i will buy it again  four stars instead of five because the tightening feeling is a little offputting and some people may not like that. wow  i was skeptical but it works

review: well i am getting more vain as i enter my 40s and especially critical about my eye bags. i was exploring surgery and injections and spending way too much time staring in the mirror. i was complaining to my stepmother and she told me she had a surgery free answer that was less than 30. she has been using it for years and said she has turned on many friends to the product. i was super skeptical so she said she was ordering me one to try. she then texted me some specific directions as she said it took her a few tries to get it right.1. wash and dry your face.2. do not put moisturizer on first unless it is water based i skip this and just put moisturizer on the rest of my face3. if you put on moisturizer wait 20 minutes before using the product4. put a small dab less than a pea sized amount and rub it into the skin under your eyes.it does sting a bit5. do not smile or make any expressions for about 5 minutes while it sets6. watch the magic worki was amazed at the pre and post difference. i would post pictures but they look like mug shots haha. really truly though the skin gets tighter the puffiness lessens and the darkness reduces. i definitely do not look like i am in my twenties but there is such an improvement. i have shared this product with 10 friends already and will keep spreading the word. it will keep me surgery free for at least a bit longer. this is a miracle product

review: after turning fiftysix i noticed that i had bags under my eyes for the first time in my life. i notice the same thing on my husband and we both decided to stop drinking and make sure we got 8 hours of sleep per night. however to our chagrin the bags did not disappear. so we also decided for health reasons to go vegan. we both lost weight going vegan and found our energy was vastly improved. however the bags under our eyes remained. we both looked tired and older due to our under eyebags. after seeing the informational on this product we decided to try it. it absolutely works. yes we have to battle the occasional drying out of the product around our eyes but we have found that if we simply dab water on our dry spots then the paste disappears again re news itself and lifts the bags.the occasional dryness would never prevent me from using this product. it truly works as for those who are concerned about not being able to use makeup with it. my routine is to put all of my products on my face and skin. i dont use a heavy foundation. i just simply use elta md tinted sunscreen. i do apply blush and powder.  and then i put on my very small dab of product under both eyes. set a timer for 10 minutes. try not to move the muscles in my face. during that time and wella. i have younger looking eyes than i ever had.  even in my 40s. i am a true believer and will continue to use this product for as long as they sell it.

review: first of all this product is for fixing not enhancing so unless you have actual deep wrinkles or unusually dark and puffy undereyes you will not be happy with it. also it takes the place of concealer so if you are a makeup addict who would be uncomfortable foregoing undereye coverage this is not for you.i was on the fence about whether or not this was worth the price for my puffy crepey undereyes until i figured out a routine that truly takes 10 years off my faceapply oilfree hyaluronic acid serum under eyeslet dry as long as possible preferably at least a 12 hourbrush teeth and do anything else i need to do that requires moving my face musclesapply normal face makeup avoiding undereye areasswipe a small bead of plexaderm under each eye focus on blending at the end near the hairline so theres no excess residue when it driesconcentrate on not moving a single muscle in my face for 10 minutes until im sure its dryi found that taking the time to follow this routine makes my undereyes look younger and smoother all day. if i notice any wrinkling during the day ive found that wetting my finger under a faucet running it across my undereyes then dabbing a tissue around the cracked area usually resets the smoothing effect. real results but takes practice to achieve

review: as a 57yrold man i like to look my best but am certainly not the metrosexual type.  admittedly i have not made my skin health a priority over my lifetime but i feel that i do not show my age.  i have used respectable mens cleansing products as well as moderatelypriced serums and moisturizers on my face and they work okay on the fine lines and dark circles around my eyes.i had seen the commercial advertising for plaxaderm and really didnt think much of a cosmetic product that cost so much and made exorbitant claims.  but after many months of commercials i decided what the heck and i purchased it through amazon instead of direct from the vendor.for the price the tube is really small but the suggested tiny amount spreads very well so it goes a long way.  maybe it evens out in the end.if it really works.i used my wifes lighted magnifying mirror to look at the fine lines around my eyes before using the product and an hour or so after applying the product.  my opinion is that it really didnt make the dramatic difference suggested by the advertising and it certainly did not do any better than the products i had been using at 13 of the price.  the dark circles under my eyes are not that bad and it didnt do much for me in that respect either.i do not want to waste my money by tossing it out so i will use up the rest of the product.  my suggestion is to compare plaxaderm to products making similar claims and try the less expensive options first. not as dramatic as the advertising suggests.
clean_review: 57yrold man like look best certainly not metrosexual type . admittedly not made skin health priority lifetime feel not show age . used respectable mens cleansing products well moderatelypriced serums moisturizers face work okay fine lines dark circles around eyes.i seen commercial advertising plaxaderm really didnt think much cosmetic product cost much made exorbitant claims . many months commercials decided heck purchased amazon instead direct vendor.for price tube really small suggested tiny amount spreads well goes long way . maybe evens end.if really works.i used wifes lighted magnifying mirror look fine lines around eyes using product hour applying product . opinion really didnt make dramatic difference suggested advertising certainly not better products using 13 price . dark circles eyes not bad didnt much respect either.i not want waste money tossing use rest product . suggestion compare plaxaderm products making similar claims try less expensive options first . not dramatic advertising suggests .

review: so this product itself works great.  the problem is the pump keeps breaking.  i thought my first bottle was near empty  so i bought a second bottle.  in 2 weeks i couldnt get it to pump out again.  thats when i realized the pump was the problem with the first bottle as well as second one.  i  checked it and the first bottle was indeed at least 12 full.  the dark label makes it hard to see content.  i decided to try and use the product by unscrewing top and dabbing it under my eyes.  it worked fine for awhile  but this kind of product is not supposed to be exposed air  so opening it every morning quickly decreased the effectiveness of the product and it started to dry out a little in the bottle.  im really bummed about spending the money on a product i like but cant use.  i havent ask for a refund or replacement.  maybe i should.  i  just bought a new brand  i have used a variety of these products for years and its not even close to as good as this product. its essynaturals. im sad to say i will be writing an unfavorable review on it. i hope the makers of instaderm improve the dispenser or just put it in a tube  i would like to be able to buy the product again. i would also like to add i could not find a way to contact instaderm to talk about the 2 broken pumps.

review: i almost never write reviews but after reading so many who do not like this product i thought i would say something that could be helpful. the bags wrinkles and circles are nearly gone after i use this product  and i am able to smile and do whatever for an entire day with full effect. you cant touch the area after its applied though so no messing around with your eye i apply my moisturizer first and then undereye concealer and blush. when its dry i apply a thin layer of instaderm all around the under eye around the corners and at the very top of my cheek where sometimes theres a little puffiness. the makeup doesnt come off and there is no white crud once in a while when i first press the pump there is a bit of hard crustiness at the tip.  just wipe that off before using it and continue so you are using only the gel. honestly im addicted  i will use this product forever i do worry a bit about dryness but continue to use my moisturizers in the morning and at night. good luck

review: im a major skincare product lover but honestly most of the time i dont bother getting eye creams. i am in my 30s and have some fine lines around my eye area but no major concerns with dark circles crows feet etc. my skin type is combination and this area of my face definitely tends to get a little dry and sensitive though. unfortunately this means that lots of eye creams are too thick goopy or heavy for me or even worse have some sort of fragrance thats irritating. many of them are also ridiculously expensive. ive had good luck with a lot of products from the eight saints brand though so i decided to give this one a trypackagingfirst thing i usually notice is the packaging. this comes in a cute little glass jar that makes it easy to get out with a fingertip or spatula. i also like this format because i feel like i can get all the product out whereas theres always some left behind that wont come out when they come in little tubes. the jar is also good enough quality that ill wash it out and reuse for something else when the eye cream is all used up. size is 15ml which i think is pretty standard amount for this kind of product.scenti sniffed this over and over like a weirdo because i really wanted to give a good description of the scent but honestly i cannot smell a thing unlike some fragrancefree products that smell weird because they didnt add fragrance to them i truly dont think this eye cream smells like anything. perfect. thumbs up.textureagain my usual peeve with eye creams is that they can be heavy too thick or feel greasy. i was really pleasantly surprised by the texture of this. its thick enough to feel rich but the best way i think id describe it is that instead of feeling creamy it almost feels like it has slip to it. kind of unusual and so niceresultsi have been using all in for about a week so i cant yet see improvement in fine lines but i certainly wouldnt expect to so quickly. however i can definitely say my eye area feels much better hydrated. the skin is feeling moisturized soft and plumper  ive noticed my makeup doesnt sink in to the little lines like it sometimes would before i use this both morning and evening and think its a good addition to my skincare routine.so if youre like me and dont usually like eye cream all in just might be the eye cream for you too. reasonably priced super hydrating and nonsmelly im glad i gave it a try and will definitely be keeping it as part of my routine. confession  i usually dont buy eye creams this one is worth it.

review: i have been using this eye cream for a week now and will admit im lazy and have only been using it in the morning not at night.  i feel this has really worked great for just the one time a day use however i realize i need to change that routine.at nearly 62 years old obviously i have concerns of lines wrinkles puffiness and just a general tired look around my eyes and have worries about lackluster skin. i have used other eye creams throughout my life but not one that feels quite as nice as this. its not sticky or greasy and seems to be more absorbable and it really does help with the puffy underneath as well as the lessening appearance of crow feet around my eyes.  taking the picture im actually quite surprised as to how nice my under eye area looks and the lack of circles as i dont sleep well thus the need for the creams and i feel like i always look tired.the cream has a nice consistency and really it only takes a little dab to pat all around underneath. i think now seeing the photo that im going to dab some above the eye as well because its clear to me that my skin care in that area has been lacking  i really like the hyaluronic acid in the cream as a great hydrator it really does the job its supposed to do i use the remaining cream on my hand around my top lip for the lip lines i got when i was a smoker.theres a very light scent to the product but i see theres no added fragrance just the normal ingredients maybe the scent im picking up is cucumber as its hard to discern. my under eye area feels very well hydrated and stays just like that for the rest of the day which i love because i am not one to keep playing with my face and skin all day im too busy for that nonsense as a nurse. i appreciate a skin care product without a bunch of added chemicals that could potentially damage my skin and health as welli have had absolutely zero reaction or sensitivity to this product no redness itching etc. i have normal skin with occasional sensitivities and my sensitivities are almost always related to fragrance that is added so i truly appreciate there is no added fragrance to this eye cream.highly recommended for any age group eight saints  eye cream is a review: ive used eight saints products for the last two years or so.  i have very sensitive skin and it is one of the only brands i can use that i dont have a negative reaction to while still seeing a positive improvement.ive used their original under eye cream for almost a year but i didnt notice too much of a difference.  being middleaged i realized that i needed something a bit more powerful for my under eye issues.ive started to get very noticeable thinning and crepeyness under my eyes.  it drives me nuts  im not very educated when it comes to skincare products so i was so excited to see that eight saints had an under eye cream that was specifically antiaging.i really like how the applicator works.  it allows an even delicate application of the product.after using the product for about a week i did start to notice a subtle plumpness.  i also noticed that the wrinklycrepey looking folds were improved as well.  im hoping as i use the product longer that some of the bluish tint due to my thin skin will improve.i recommend this product if youre just starting to struggle with the signs of aging especially if you have sensitive skin like me it definitely added some plumpness

review: first off ignore my eyebrows in these photos. ive had a crazy week and it shows. i wanted to take these unedited barefaced photos because i need to spread the good word so lets get into it. please understand i am not at all the person who throws caution to the wind and puts naked skin photos on the internet. i am doing this for you dear reader so stay with mei wish i had a before photo to show you. know why i dont because i didnt expect this to work. i am one of those people blessed with genetic undereye dark circles  puffiness and its something thats bothered me since adolescence. im 41 now and also somewhat of a skincare junkie. this means ive tried a lot of eye cream  patches  treatments over the years from cheaper to pricier.none of which have ever managed to impress me. until this one.first of all ive had nightmare allergies lately and my order happened to come in when i felt like death. i took it out of the package with zero expecations. i mean if my hopes were on a scale of 110 i was at a 0. nothing ever really works at least not in a noticeable or impressive way and i expected the same from this. i didnt feel well and i wanted a burst of serotonin from opening my amazon package. that is the only reason i opened it when i did. to my surprise what i noticed immediately was that the metal applicator feels incredible under your eyes.most definitely when youre struggling with allergies. it was very soothing and i decided i would continue using it for that reason alone. i have applied it religiously during my morning and nighttime routine over the past nine days. i decided to sit down and write this review because i am in shock. nothing in my 25 years of trying to banish my dark circles has ever lightened them. ever. this did not only that but there is some other level of sorcery in the formula that also decreased the puffiness. i have checked myself out in multiple mirrors and in different lighting to make sure im not losing it. my undereyes are for real lighter and less puffy and its been less than two weeks. turning 40 last year hit me like a ton of bricks and ive been at an alltime low in terms of feeling pretty and noticing the less than awesome changes in my skin. this is the first time in forever that ive been able to see legitimate improvement. because i have no before photos to show you look at my afters and know that 1 my undereyes were a lot darker than this 2 in the photo where i tilt my chin down that angle typically looks way puffier and its something thats always bothered me.i dont even know what else to say except this if youve had a similar struggle over the years  you hate looking tired no matter what you do but dont want to go the injectable route.try this stuff. seriously just try it. it isnt an instant miracle nothing is but if you make it a part of your regular routine.for once it will actually pay off. i cant say enough good things and now i want to try the entire product line to see what other magic they have cooking up over there

review: i swear everytime i get a different eight saints product that i havent tried yet it becomes my favorite and just when i think i have decided which one is the best i try another one and then its all up in the air again. eight saints you make it so difficult  okay enough of that lets get to the product. this is called wonderfill a new eye cream added to their line. i was so excited to try this when it first came out but it had already sold out on their website by the time i was able to purchase it. so i waited waited waited patiently for it to be in stock again then saw since they now have a storefront here on amazon it finally was added on here a little after the launch of this on the website. as soon as i saw this get in stock i grabbed it and i am so glad i did because it went out of stock on here not long after i ordered. this is really good eye cream. i got this to use during my morning skincare routine. i have noticed while there is a plethora of eye cream products out there to choose from most are heavy and much more suitable and reared toward a night time use so i wanted to find something that would be light and able to be used quickly and easily and would work not only under makeup but could be used with makeup and lastly something that would of course actually work. this product exceeded my expectations and all my wants of what i was looking for in a product. this comes in a long slender tube with a silver colored cooling applicator tip. this aids in getting blood circulation going and perking up your eyes like a caffienated product does. i especially love this feature because instead of using your finger the tip helps with not pulling on your eye area which is the most delicate spot on your face and you dont want to do alot of pulling or tugging around in that area. there is alot of product in this and will last you a long time. i usually use the all in eight saints eye cream but i use that in the evening and wanted something to use for my a.m. skincare routine. this can be used for both p.m. and for a.m. and works good for both but the morning timeday use with this is best. the key ingredients are niacinamide peptides hyaluronic acid and vitamin e. this is going to give you a filled in look that actually lasts throughout the whole day. this has a creamy texture and is white in color. it goes on your skin white but once rubbed in its clear and you see no color left behind. this has no scent and is great for all skin types and very good even for sensitive skin. this does not cause any breakouts or purging no skin reactions and will not make your eyes itchy. this will cause any puffiness to go down completely will make your undereye hydrated so its plumped looking fills in wrinkles and softens the look of any emerging lines and will cover and reduce dark undereye circles. this goes on wonderfully under makeup and does not pill or clump. it actually helps make a priming effect for your concealer and foundation keeping it from settling into any lines and caking up. if you decide to not wear it with makeup or under makeup you dont look like you have product applied under your eyes and doesnt look greasy or wet. for an added boost you can keep this in the refrigerator or a mini makeupskincare fridge and will provide an extra cooling effect with the metal tip and will take away all puffiness. also i find that if you want to use this with a p.m. routine put this on first then your regular eye cream over it and it works superb as well. when using this make sure to apply this after your cleanse and your face is still damp because hyaluronic acid thrives in moisture so you definitely want to apply when your face is damp after cleansing or after you apply your toner so you get the benefits of this product and so it works on your skin.extra info on eight saints and why i love this brandall products made in the u.s.a.non toxic plant based natural and organic ingredientsno syntheticscertified cruelty free and veganall ingredients are responsibly sourcedsmall batch processingonly uses ingredients that are backed by real results and years of research eight saints did it again

review: this is the third type of eye cream ive tried from eight saints and its another one i quite like though i feel like its the one ill reach for most often as a specific spot treatment rather than a daily eye cream based on my own particular needs. this works as well as the other two their eye gel and eye brightening cream on fine lines and generally firming up the areas around the eye. where this seems to really do an excellent job is to fill in sunken areas under the eye. if i use this plumping cream on one side and the brightening cream on the other the side with the plumping cream is much more even overall and doesnt have the deeper lines and bags under my eyes. when i was really tired after a long and exciting thanksgiving day this cream made me look almost human againbut one of my main eye concerns is puffy bags under the eyes above where i have sunken areas or bags and this works less well on reducing the swelling in that area than the eye gel or brightening cream from eight saints. since thats more of my daily concern ill continue to use those as my regular items but will absolutely keep this plumping cream on hand for the days when exhaustion is particularly visible on my face and id like to erase it work great for filling in fine lines and sunken eyes from lack of sleep

review: after trying some of eightsaints products and being extremely pleased i have been slowly switching most of my facial care products over as i run out of what i have and i have yet to be disappointed.  the plumping eye cream is no different.  after just a few days i have been able to tell a difference.  grant it not a huge difference but still a difference.  my eyes are a little less puffy droopy bags and now more of a a filled in more solid look.  the darkness has faded some as well.  the consistency is perfect.  not too thick or too thin.  there is no peeling. it is just right.  after using their other products i shouldnt be so surprised but i still am.  this seems to be a great product that i will use for years to come.  i hope they dont ever reformulate as i love what this is.  highly recommend if you are getting on up there and starting to notice the droopy bag look or dark circles.  you cant go wrong with this already seeing some great results in just a few days

review: update 623its been almost a week since i added extra jojoba oil to my eye routine vitamin c jojoba oil eye cream retinoid. i sort of gave up on using the face cream since it seems like its too thin plus the combination of retinoid and face cream on my neck gave me rash. im happy to say that it helps a lot my under eyes fine lines and tiredness seemed to be improving overnight after using the combination of vitamin c a tiny drop of jojoba oil eye cream and retinoid. it might be because the skin under my eyes is way too dry compared to the rest of my face remember when putting every single item that a little bit goes a long way. i just used a super tiny drop of jojoba oil on my ring finger which normally enough for both eyes and start dabbing. the key is layering. dab each product on your skin lightly let it absorb for a few minutes before going to the next product. just think of it as painting. you wouldnt want to start a new fresh paint on top of a wet paint would you cs was really excellent in getting back to me for a full refund. i did email them for a full refund but also mentioned that i was very conflicted about it so ill leave it up to them if they want to refund it or not its been exactly a month since i received the eye cream retinoid and face cream that i feel good to write a review. this review is based on just the eye cream and i will do a separate review on the other two update seems like i cant do a separate review on their retinoid and face cream. oh wells.a little background about my skin its very oily has some hormonal acne and im approaching late 30s. for almost a year ive been trying to switch all of my face products to a more natural kind by using tea tree oil face wash alcohol free toner vitamin c serum and a concoction of 6 drops of jojoba oil 4 drops of rosehip seed oil and 4 drops of tea tree oil. unfortunately its not enough for my stubborn hormonal acne and im sick of looking like i just hit puberty.so i stumble upon this brand and it piques my interest. 3000 mostly positive reviews and i thought why not i love the cute packaging and the fact that its air pump so the cream will stay clean. be gentle when dispensing it as you can easily dispense too much. i use this three times a day morning before work evening after work and at night before bedtime. i washed my face this time with face wash with some salicylic acid per doctors instruction toner and vitamin c serum. i put three dots of the eye cream under my eyes two dots on my eyelids and start to dab.the cream is pretty light and it absorbs quickly without leaving any greasy feeling. i was excited to see the result so i used this religiously and a month later im sad to say that i dont see any result. the lines under my eyes are still there and somehow my bb cream went cakey when used over it.last night i tried a dab of jojoba oil on each eye dab the eye cream over it when its dry and went to bed. this morning im happy to report that i saw a significant improvement the lines under my eyes were significantly reduced and my eyes looked plumper. ill try it again later and maybe write an updated review on this new method.im honestly torn about this cream. do i love it meh. do i hate it no. am i going to buy it again meh. well see what happen after this bottle but my point is i shouldnt have to add extra product to see it working. not seeing any result

review: i was really loving this cream. however i took a break from all creams for about 2 weeks and when i went to use this again tonight i discovered that the cream had developed moldy black and green spots in it.  the jar is still almost full from when i ordered it 3 months ago but i am outside the return window.  now im afraid to put this on my face i understand there are no preservatives but everything i use is natural and this is the first time i have had something mold on me like this.  needless to say wont be purchasing it again.  which is too bad because i feel like it was helping my bags and undereye wrinkles   i really wanted to love it.i emailed the company tonight and will update when i receive a response.updatereceived a response from the company that more than made up for the inconvenience. the representative explained i received a tub from a larger bad batch one of many during this time frame that other reviewers citing the mold also received. the 5star rating is more for this company and their amazing customer service than necessarily the creamupdate 2received my replacement cream in the mail today with get this.a handwritten apology note from a worker at the company along with a thank you for my original purchase. i mean who does that anymore lilyana naturals does thats who  i will come back to this company for all my natural skincare needs without hesitation hands down the best customer service i have ever received

review: ive been using this cream for a few years as a cream base for revlons revitalift 1.5 hyaluronic acid serum. really helps with wrinkly eyes but you still must get the requisite hours of sleep at least 6.5 to 7 hours for me for it to work noticeably well.additionally heres how to tell if you have a legitimate product. the lot number on the box yes there should be a box should exactly match the lot number on the jar. the jar itself is ceramiccolored glass and heavy. the top is plastic and can have some messiness of the red border on top but not much  basically its not a perfect imprint of the red border. there is a clear tab on the back label that you can either pierce or pull down in order to open the jar.there is no longer a plastic coverlid sealing the product when you remove the top lid anymore. ive bought this product at regular retail stores  not through amazon or third parties  and it just isnt there. the top lid may or may not have the cream on it depending on how it is shipped. if its through amazon im sure it gets tossed a bit and may show an air bubble inside with a large dollop of product on the lid. cream should be white and thick and have a slight odor but not strong  should not be sour smelling.its possible all of this can be true and the jar may have still been opened andor used. if thats a concern stick to retail stores and pay extra for the peace of mind. works well with revitalift 1.5 hyaluronic acid serum when legitimate heres how to tell

review: these products have absolutely surpassed my expectations. i have very oily skin thats prone to breakouts and have tried everything under the sun to stop my acne. but the problem is most moisturizers leave my skin feeling and looking really greasy. neutrogenas products have really made oily skin a non factorfor me. my favorites are the hydraulic moisturizer facial scrub and the sunscreen for how fast they dry and the glowing not oily complexion they leave your skin with once you apply them.the wash really leaves my skin with a clean feeling without feeling dry. when i first started using it i had a few spots on my face that were turning into large pimples and this stuff completely reversed them.the moisturizer is really gellike and dry upon application making it easy to apply the nonoil sunscreen which does the same thing. keeps my face dry and ive noticed that alot of finelines that i used to have are gone. the night time cream is very solid as well. the eye cream is great too. im only 24 so i dont really have bags under my eyes but its definitely made my undereyes alot smoother. this is definitely a good investment.before using neutrogena i used lumin for a few months. their products are decent too but they dont cater to oily skin types as well as neutrogena does so their formulas didnt help me much with oil and i still had small breakouts from having so much oil on my face. plus its more expensive. not trying to bash lumin but thats just my honest comparison.overall 55 and would definitely recommend over other competitors

review: i am 75 years old and for a number of years have had bags and circles under my eyes. i have tried a number of products that were supposed to help reduce these problems with little to no results. i decided to try this eye cream because of tv ads and i was familiar with the brand.generally i allow similar products 6090 days to judge results but after 6 weeks of using this product morning and evening i thought the bags looked smaller. i took a current picture of me and found a photo of me from 4 years ago. i was blown away by the difference. even though i was wearing no eye makeup in the current picture i looked years younger without the bags under my eyes.even though the swelling under my eyes isnt completely gone i feel continued use of the eye cream will further reduce the swelling that is left. i should also mention that i am wearing no makeup at all in the 2022 picture. i would definitely recommend this eye cream and hope that it works for you as it has for me.i hope this review was helpful for you. nothing tells the story like pictures. my eyebags of many years are going away.

review: in my 56 years this is the first roc product ive tried. i bought it for the price point not crazy expensive like some serums. my skin looks pretty good for my age thanks to good genes and disliking the suns intense heatminimizing sun damage. as we age our eyes retreat and sink further in to our orbital bones giving the appearance of shadows and depth where its not wanted.  our eyelids travel downward and become crepey. and living in the southeast im in a location where everything blooms and causes allergies and eye puffiness. this product promised to help with dark circles firming texture and puffiness so i thought id try it.  i should have used more caution with my sensitive skin. it stings for several hours after i apply it. i attribute that to the synthetic cocktail that it is although some natural products can sting also. but does it work meh. ive been using it for a few weeks and while i didnt expect a miracle i see no difference. i have been using an allergy friendly natural brand of skin care that has been amazing but is midrange pricey and i didnt want to splurge on their eye serum.  now that ive tried the cheaper alternative ive learned my lesson and will just spend double the money on my tried and true favorite brand. i have been using this roc faithfully for several weeks but see absolutely no difference in the dark circles texture or fine lines around my eyes. its just not worth the sting to me. i wish amazon had half stars for rating. 4 seems generous 3 seems harsh. 3.5 stars seems about right.

review: if you are hoping to use this for a week and have all your wrinkles erased you will be dissapointed. only surgery can give instant results. but if you are willing to apply this daily you will see results. i have been using roc since december and i have just began noticing some actual noticeable reduction in my fine lines and wrinkles. and even more surprising is that i am noticing that the deeper wrinkle between my eyebrows is fading. is it gone no. but the results are truly impressive and i am surprisingly shocked i really didnt think over the counter retinal creams could work but this cream has proven me wrong. i am on my third tube and about to purchase my fourth. this brand contains the highest concentrate of retinol you can get without a prescription and i highly recommend it. i am now a believer as the proof is on my faceeta i just bought my 4th tube of this cream. i am 38 years old. i smoked from 14 to 32 years old. my face especially around my lips and eyes and between my eye brows was really wrinkling up from all those years of smoking and from sun exposure as i lived in florida for years and never used sunscreen. i just took this pic this morning in my car on the way to work. we all know early morning light is not kind as far as how it works for photos. my face has noticeably less wrinkles than it did 6 months ago. i dont look younger than my 38 years by any means. but i feel like i look my age instead of looking 50.which is what i should look after 20 some years of smoking i can tell you that retinol works. this cream is wonderful and my results are really starting to show. it takes time but the results are real i can see them with my own eyes. 6 months and you will see results

review: i have basically three brands i use now especially as i age. im 66 soon to be 67. i always used the basic facial cosmetics covergirl  maybelline and loreal.  i decided after reaching my 60s i needed to upgrade i had damaged my skin over the years and began seeing the impact. i began with no.7 i loved the line and noticed the difference in the quality of the actual product itself. then along the way i picked up some of the vichy and roc items.  speechless.the results using these lines all three and i found rotating each day worked like a charm and results are amazing. this was by no means a simple process in buying the products or testing by mixing and matching but the results were well worth my time and costs. over the past sixmonth period ive bought at least 68 products in each line. i know i know expensive but what the heck i decided you only live once and for once i was placing myself at the top of my own priority list. something ive rarely or have ever done. but well worth it for the results archived up to this point and worth every penny. i know i spent well over 500. to 800. dollars but no regrets whatsoever. people ask me what did you do to your face and neck your skin looks great you hardly have any lines. i no longer use makeup no need. i use a drop or two of liquid no.7 cheek  lip color thats it. powder never touches my face any longer its not needed my face has really smoothed out.ive used a top line from paris called predire a nice sized kit cost over 5000.00 i loved the line but cost was unrealistic for my budget. so spending 500.00 to 1000.00 on the stuff im now using is a bargin. plus they work better than the line from paris not sold in the usa.have fun you only have one life and one face. top product for myself.

review: i just received this yesterday used for the first time last night and woke up with very dryfeeling skin around my eyes. i wasnt ready to chalk it up to this product until i put on concealer and saw how flaky my eyelids were. i now have combo skin that was once very oily ive dealt with literally one dry patch my entire life so i know it was this product. i wont give this another try i cant risk it getting any worse. i also dont love how light the consistency is it absorbs much too quickly and i feel like it actually sucks moisture from my skin. it made my skin matte and tight not hydrated and soothed. it may just be the wrong formula for me. i just thank the heavens i didnt have an allergic reaction like some people because i do have reactive skin and that would be my luck.additionally i agree that the packaging needs to be changed. i appreciate so much that its in an aluminum tube as opposed to plastic but these tubes have a mind of their own and sometimes product just keeps coming out.you just have to be so delicate with this container especially while really full so its just not practical especially for travel. there was a dent in mine just when unboxing and that tiny dent caused about 4 days worth of product to gush out when i just unscrewed the cap for the first time. being an eye cream it could come in a glass jar with metal lid and remain recyclable.i appreciate that theres no fragrance.also oddly it just came in a bright pink bubble mailer to my cagedkeyed mailbox which amazon never does like something youd buy from an individual seller that came through the mail. and no seal on the box or tube so im not sure if there is one when you buy from a brickandmortar store. woke up with dry flaky eyelids

review: this is the holy grail for a low end eye cream that works i have a dark under eye area.like the whole under eye.and have tried too many eye creams to count. came across this years ago got complacent and decided to try others. what a mistake. finally found this again and dont plan to leave.heres how i use it apply a thin layer of roc multi correxion 5 in 1 all over the eye area wait a few minutes and pat excess off. apply tiny dots of it bye bye undereye around the eye socket then work it up into the dark area. add a little more if necessary. finish with nyx translucent pressed powder again pressing with makeup sponge around the outer eye socket area concentrating on the outer edge. the brightness draws the attention away from the under eye and out to the bright.i personally have never been able to be completely rid of dark circles its genetic. so for me this eye cream does not erase dark circles it just relieves them but it relieves them better than anything else ive tried to date. i recommend it. best under eye cream
